name: three-uilas-website
description: Three Uilas - Electric Farm Utility Vehicles Website

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:html
scripts.copy:assets: cp -r assets dist/ && cp src/script.js dist/
scripts.copy:html: cp src/index.html dist/ && sed -i '' 's|../dist/|./|g; s|../assets/|./assets/|g' dist/index.html
scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run serve
